title: CodeInsight++_v1
author: Ashutosh Khuntia
description:
This script automates the process of  code analysis for C++ projects hosted in Git repositories. 
it provides a convenient way to:

Analyze all C++ files in a repository for potential errors.
Collect and parse the analysis results.
Store the results in a structured JSON format.
Optionally upload the results to IBM Cloud for further processing or storage.
